text: Hi everyone, I’m Gideon. I’m a PhD a student in machine learning at ETH Zurich where I’ve been working on convex optimization for ML, such as Frank-Wolfe as well as variational inference. I’ve been following the Julia project for some time now and am always looking for excuses to get involved. I’ve recently been getting excited about combining machine learning with more traditional modelling approaches (PDEs). The DifferentialEquations package seems at the forefront and I hope to get invovled.
